thread.title: Video: Ghana’s new President, Akufo-Addo caught in inauguration speech plagiarism scandal
thread.title_full: Video: Ghana’s new President, Akufo-Addo caught in inauguration speech plagiarism scandal

author: Ikenna
title: Video: Ghana’s new President, Akufo-Addo caught in inauguration speech plagiarism scandal
text:
Home » News » Video: Ghana’s new President, Akufo-Addo caught in inauguration speech plagiarism scandal Video: Ghana’s new President, Akufo-Addo caught in inauguration speech plagiarism scandal On 3:40 pm In News , Videos by Ikenna Comments 
Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-Addo, who was yesterday, sworn in as Ghana’s new president has been caught in an alleged plagiarism scandal. 
Akufo-Addo had portions of his inaugural speech at the Independence Square, Ghana, lifted from the inaugural speeches delivered by former US presidents George Bush and Bill Clinton. 
See video of Clinton’s plagiarized speech below 
See video of Bush’s plagiarized speech below: Ikenna
